name: Orbio
description:
Tip: Always keep charging and releasing near full charge as quick as you can

A submission to Godot Wild 46.

Use your mouse and charge movement by holding Left click, release to launch. Try to hit planets smaller than you.

Made in a 72 hour chunk of the Jam period (personal time constraint, was not required to be this short)

Theme: Orb

Wildcards: I Feel Small, Fear of the Dark

A game by Zyuxis

Special Thanks for BGM: https://twitter.com/IndieKylo
